Honestly nothing comes to mind but there must be more frameworks than just Spring right? :D
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,9 @@
+### Scope of this repository
+
+Both javaagent and library-based approaches to the following:
+
+* Instrumentation for specific Java libraries and frameworks
+  * Emitting spans and metrics (and in the future logs)
+* System metrics 
+* Logging integrations
+* Spring integrations

nodes.bodyText: I think frameworks are covered under Instrumentation bullet above. Narrowed this down to Spring Boot starters for now(?)
